title: Tomáš Hrdlička
text:
Tomáš Hrdlička (born 17 February 1982) is a <a href="Czech%20%28people%29">Czech</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who recently played as a defender for the <a href="Slovak%20Superliga">Corgoň Liga</a> club <a href="%C5%A0K%20Slovan%20Bratislava">Slovan Bratislava</a>. He spent most of his teenage years playing in the <a href="Slavia%20Prague">Slavia Prague</a> youth setup making his senior debut aged twenty. He moved to <a href="FK%20Mlad%C3%A1%20Boleslav">FK Mladá Boleslav</a> in 2007 on a free transfer.
He has also represented the Czech Republic internationally at the under-21s level, winning a gold medal with the <a href="Czech%20Republic%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">U21 team</a> in the 2002 <a href="UEFA%20European%20Under-21%20Football%20Championship">European championship</a>.
